zero.description: Full-width and background containers. Fixed navigation containers such as headers, and side-panels.

sm.description: Use this for subtle and smaller elements that don't contain complex information. Often high-density components. Checkbox, Pill

md.description: Components presenting info text, user input, user feedback. Inputs, Toasts, Snack bars, Tooltips, Error Alert Banner

lg.description: Core large containers, card containers and popups that house moderate amounts of content and/or data: Card, Menus

xl.description: Primarily used for elevated and simple parent containers with greater amounts of content and UI. Dialogs, Modals, Bottom Sheets

round.description: Full rounding is reserved high-visibility components. This shape is intended to draw attention. Buttons, Badge, Status Indicator, Essential Inputs, Border Containers (Not Cards)

half.description: Use this for subtle and small components that don't require to group complex information like Status Indicators, Checkboxes and Color Swatches.

x2.description: Use this for all the containers and popups: All Cards, Modals, Tooltips and Toasts.

x4.description: (Mobile) Primary containers that house a large amount of other elements and complex information

x6.description: (Mobile) Full width sheets that are temporary and modal views
